document.discussion_title: Line-ups: Tottenham unchanged from Stoke thrashing for visit of West Brom
document.topic_text: Line-ups: Tottenham unchanged from Stoke thrashing for visit of West Brom Mauricio Pochettino's title chasers know only a win will do at White Hart Lane after Leicester thrashed Swansea 4-0 yesterday. They're eight points behind the Foxes, and need a victory tonight to keep themselves in the hunt. Spurs romped to a 4-0 win over their own at Stoke last week, and Pochettino has stuck with the side that won at the Britannia Stadium. Baggies boss Tony Pulis makes four changes to his side. They lost 2-0 when they visited north London on Thursday to face Arsenal. Ben Foster, James Chester, Sandro and Saido Berahino all drop out. Tottenham: Lloris, Walker, Alderweireld,... read more Daily Star , 18 April 2016 in Sport Dele Alli warns Leicester to expect a fight to the finish line as Tottenham cruise to Stoke win... despite... Dele Alli told Leicester City to expect a title fight to the finish after scoring twice in Tottenham’s stunning win at Stoke on Monday night. The England midfielder squandered the chance of a hat-trick after somehow missing an open goal, but warned... Daily Mail , Monday, 23:29 in Sport Tottenham eye move for West Brom striker to bolster Premier League title-chasing squad Berahino, 22, is set to play at White Hart Lane on Monday night for the first time since Tottenham had four bids rejected last summer. The England U-21 man is out of contract at the end of next season but Baggies boss Tony Pulis wants him to stay.... Daily Express , Saturday, 22:52 in Sport LINE-UPS: Tottenham UNCHANGED from Chelsea defeat for tonight's clash against Swansea Spurs boss Mauricio Pochettino has decided to stick with the same side which lost the Capital One Cup final to the Blues on Sunday for the visit of Gary Monk's men. Tottenham: Lloris, Walker, Dier, Vertonghen, Rose; Bentaleb, Mason; Chadli, Eriksen,... Daily Star , 4 March 2015 in Sport
